name: Ulemiste Hotel

reviews.text: This is a very nice brand new hotel and very,very good value for money.
reviews.title: Great new hotel

reviews.text: It is very close to the airport which is great if you dont like messing about with transfers in a new city.The old town is still only a 5-10 min taxi ride away so it is not like you are so far out.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

description: This modern 4-star hotel is centrally located at beautiful lake Ulemiste, 3.5 km from the medieval Tallinn Old Town. Within two minutes walking distance is Estonia`s largest shopping center and Tallinn airport. The hotel has 128 comfortable standard and business class rooms, cozy a la carte restaurant Fuente, fitness centre, conference centre and large parking lot. It is possible to choose a room with stunning view over Lake Ulemiste. Fast and convenient connection to the Old Town on bus no. 2.
